Package Model

Class Summary
AbstractAlignmentTool This class provides an abstract class to be extended by different alignment algorithms.
BLASTTool This class holds the pathnames to the BLAST alignment tool, FASTA reference file, output file and the parameters for BLAST
BowtieTool This class holds the pathnames to the BLAST alignment tool, FASTA reference file, output file and the parameters for BLAST
FileNameExtensionFilter An implementation of FileFilter that filters using a specified set of extensions.
Group The class is responisible for storing a list of IDs entered by the use for a group.
InputLine A line from an input file that is colon separated.
ModelInterface The class acts as an interface to the View and the Controller.
Parameters This class contains all the parameters that will be used by BLAST and the number of cores.
PreProcessingHandler This class is responsible for communicating with other classes that are involved in handling the PreProcessing Flow.
ShortRead This class represents a particular short read in an input file.
ShortReadComparator  
ShortReadScoreComparator
